ygData.subject: Lame List of New Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone check out http://everquest.station.sony.com/p_archmage.html Now - I hate to go on another rant - and I guess GZ is trying to be cute but every class
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone check out http://everquest.station.sony.com/p_archmage.html

Now - I hate to go on another rant - and I guess GZ is trying to be "cute"
but every class gets a detailed description of their new spells - while
bards essentially get the new song's names... Some of them you can
certainly figure out what he means - like "Attack Speed verses from Vilia "
but others like "A few notes from Solon " gives us little to no information.

Contrast this with

ENCHANTER
Look for:

New Charms, including one that is neigh well irresistible

Powerful Buffs, including:

a.. Many attack speed buffs
b.. An upgrade to Augmentation, Shadow and Berserker Spirit
c.. A new Clarity, single and group versions
d.. Upgrades to Insight, Brilliance and Adorning Grace
e.. Rune V


Slyde Katzenjammer
just dinged to 39!
